text: Yakov Sverdlov () is a 1940 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Аллея звезд российского кино открылась на киностудии им. Горького The movie tells about the life and work of the Chairman of the Central Executive Committee Yakov Sverdlov. It stars Leonid Lyubashevsky, Maksim Shtraukh, and Andro Kobaladze. == Actors == * Leonid Lyubashevsky as Yakov Sverdlov * Maksim Shtraukh as Lenin * Andro Kobaladze as Stalin * Pavel Kadochnikov as Maxim Gorky * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Trofimow == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1940 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Yakov Sverdlov (movie)
